Title: Relates to the sale of flavored vapor products
Summary: Provides that no vapor products dealer, or any agent or employee of a vapor products dealer, shall sell or offer for sale at retail, or store flavored vapor product reasonably intended for sale in the state any flavored vapor product intended or reasonably expected to be used with or for the consumption of nicotine.
LawCode: Amd ยง1399-mm-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the sale of flavored vapor products
